results.title: A Multi-Objective Approach for Drug Repurposing in Preeclampsia
results.text_hl: On the other hand, even when the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ during @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@ in unknown, a close statin (@CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@) is known to reduce the @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@.

citations.NLM: Tejera E, Pérez-Castillo Y, Chamorro A, Cabrera-Andrade A, Sanchez ME. A Multi-Objective Approach for Drug Repurposing in Preeclampsia Molecules. 2021 Feb 3;26(4):. PMID: 33546161

results.title: Pravastatin as the statin of choice for reducing pre-eclampsia-associated endothelial dysfunction.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to evaluate the ability of @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ to reduce @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@pre-eclampsia@@@-associated markers of @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ endothelial cells.

citations.NLM: de Alwis N, Beard S, Mangwiro YT, Binder NK, Kaitu'u-Lino TJ, Brownfoot FC, Tong S, Hannan NJ. Pravastatin as the statin of choice for reducing pre-eclampsia-associated endothelial dysfunction. Pregnancy Hypertens. 2020 Apr;20():83-91. PMID: 32199147

results.title: Simvastatin Alleviates Pathology in a Rat Model of Preeclampsia Involving ERK/MAPK Pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Alleviates Pathology in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rat@@@ Model of @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@Preeclampsia@@@ Involving @GENE_EPHB1 @GENE_24338 @@@ERK@@@/MAPK Pathway.

citations.NLM: Dong X, Shi D. Simvastatin Alleviates Pathology in a Rat Model of Preeclampsia Involving ERK/MAPK Pathway. Reprod Sci. 2017 Jul;24(7):1053-1061. PMID: 27856999

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits oxidative stress via the activation of nuclear factor erythroid 2-related factor 2 signaling in trophoblast cells.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@Hypoxia@@@ is one of the important negative regulators of @GENE_NFE2L2 @GENE_4780 @@@Nrf2@@@ activation, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibits oxidative stress through the activation of @GENE_NFE2L2 @GENE_4780 @@@Nrf2@@@ signaling in trophoblasts, indicating the potential therapeutic role of statin for @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@pre-eclampsia@@@.

citations.NLM: Chigusa Y, Kawasaki K, Kondoh E, Mogami H, Ujita M, Fujita K, Tatsumi K, Takeda S, Konishi I. Simvastatin inhibits oxidative stress via the activation of nuclear factor erythroid 2-related factor 2 signaling in trophoblast cells. J Obstet Gynaecol Res. 2016 Jan;42(1):36-43. PMID: 26556031
